title: Retirement Advisor: Thanksgiving For Advisors
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Thanksgiving is very much a day celebrating economic success, and as such, is something financial advisors can learn from. I would argue that their thriving when their main hope had been to survive was the source of their jubilation. This podcast (5:06) suggests that advisor’s concrete actions in the realm of wealth management over time take on an intangible quality, in which clients can enjoy wealth and financial stability as a result of the advisor’s influence over many decades. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
